name: Sela the Dragon Lady (Demo v1.1)
description:
A big update showing off new mechanics and a brand new level!  Use's Sela's new bash to kick some Troll behind and help the Underground Orchard bloom once more.

Major Changes: Charge Bash:

Hold down the charge button to gather up a burst of wind at Sela's feet, then release once it's charged to go flying into the direction held.  Sela can really throw her weight around and knock Troll down flat and even break frail objects.  Be warn, if you hit something tougher than she is, Sela will be stunned and vulnerable.

Health/Weight Gain:

Sela now has a health meter, represented by her current weight.  Get hit, and her body will quickly metabolize to keep her going, while eating food will help bulk her up nice and sturdy.  Too many hits, and you'll be sent back to the last food cart you stopped by.

Underground Orchard:

A brand new level to explore with it's own music, mechanics, and a new enemy to face.   Navigate the chocolate caverns and return the Sun Stones to their pedestals to grow crystal fruits.

Minor Changes:
  • Sela fall faster in midair
  • Movement speed increased
  • Default size reduced
  • Troll hit boxes more consistent
  • Troll hurt expressions added
  • Demo Level renamed to Dragon Coast
  • Food items and cart added to Dragon Coast
Sela Dev Team :

BeanMChocolate - Game Concept, Environmental Artist

IceDev - Project Lead, Programmer, Character Designer, Modeller, and Animator

INAFQUEEN - Music Production, Sound Design, Composer, Proofreader

Featuring the Voice Talents of CoffeeCakeDemon

If you're interested in joining the SelaDev team, you can message IceDevGames on Twitter, or send an email to contact@icedevgames.com.  We're always looking for talent to help expand Sela's widening world!
